transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha theek hai sir. Main keh raha aapke paas number hai unka main de du aapko.
Executive: Kiska?
Customer: Jinhone aapko sale kiya tha Anjali Besht, Basudev Singh Negi.
Customer: Ye call recorded hai?
Executive: Ha ji sir call saari recording hoti hai.
Customer: Achha ye nahi hua aapki pehle wali recording nahi thi na. Aap ye kyun puch rahe hain ki mujhe unka number hai ya nahi hai?
Executive: Main puch raha hu matlab agar main koi help karna chahta hu to main aapki kar deta hu constant track.
Executive: Kehna sir IndiaMART ki team mein kya baat hai nahi baat hai. Main unko bhi track kar raha hu na cheezein.
Customer: Mujhe aapne seedha mujhe ye bol diya hai ki main main unse contact kar lu jinhone mujhe sale kiya hai. Main to aap aap mujhe bole na ki aap main mere par bol rahe ki aapne maine aapko bola hai ki one month use kar lu nahi to refund. Main to refund ka aap kahin zikr hi nahi kiya. Maine aapko bola sir.
Customer: Maine aapse ye nahi bola aapki call recorded thi maine 50 baar puchha tha aapse. Maine aapko ye nahi bola tha ki aap mujhe refund kar do. Maine bola main mail karunga us par mujhe reply aayega ki mujhe refund milega to main us par main aage baat karunga nahi to nahi karunga. Aapne mujhe chhutte hi ye bola ki aap unse is cheez ke liye aap unse baat karo jinhone aapko sale kiya hai. Aap ek dusre par daalte raho koi baat nahi.
Executive: Sir main koi taal nahi raha hu. Main to sir as a senior manager hu. Main to aapse ye solution ke liye baat kar raha hu ki main aapko product mein bola dalwaunga ye karunga aap sir sir aise solution nahi milta na sir aapkeval apni baat kar rahe aap ye bhi to dekhiye na main aapko solution ke liye to bol raha hu aap main unse bol raha hu aap baat kar lo. Main to apni taraf se best ab dekho unhone koi commit kiya tha aap available refund ka bola tha ye kya tha. Par sir aapne mujhe bola unhone aapko ye bola tha saari lead verify milengi. To obvious si baat hai sir saari lead verify to hum koshish karte but har lead call par verify nahi hoti hai. Wo possible nahi hai but ha kuch lead aapke follow up banenge kuch phone bhi nahi uthayenge isi mein se conversion hoga.
Customer: But ye to aap apni taraf se bol rahe na ki main nahi milega to main refund le lunga pura paisa. Sir refund ki to sir aisa koi hamare yaha kuch hai hi nahi buylead aap use kijiye conversion ek saal mein itna to aapko bhi pata hai ki do teen deal bhi agar nikal jayegi paisa aapka nikal jayega paisa.
Customer: Maine aapko initially yehi baat boli thi ki mere paas 50 lead aayengi na 50 lead bhi agar meri convert nahi hogi mujhe usse koi dikkat nahi hai. Ek mahine nahi hogi do mahine nahi hogi 12 ke 12 mahine nahi hogi na mujhe usse bhi koi dikkat nahi hai. Abhi bhi bol raha hu main aapko.
Customer: Fir wo meri problem hogi ki main convert nahi kar pa raha hu lead ko.
Executive: Ha to lead main aapki aur improve kara raha hu lead improve karane ke liye main aapke products ko maine yehi pehle yehi pehle call par yehi puchha tha aur koi product aapne bola nahi hai to maine bola theek hai main isi ko aur dekhta hu aapke competitor ka product uthakar aur kisko kya kya aur naam se dal sakte hai wo main kuch product increase karane ki koshish karta hu usse shayad buylead improve aur ho. Jab buylead ka flow badhega uske baad aap ek baar kharid ke dekhiye ki kya hai koi data banaiye ki ha ye mujhe kya pata agar genuine aisa problem ho ki nahi yaar saari lead kharid raha hu saari ki saari wahi aa rahi hai jaha har jagah buyer bol hi rahe ki mujhe na kharidna nahi bechna hai to usko main escalate karunga usko obvious si baat hai aapke behalf par aap bhi kar sakte hai maine ek mahine mein 70 lead kharidi 70 mein 50 ke 50 aise hi aa gaye obvious si baat hai agar aapki taraf se genuine hai bilkul galat lead aa rahi hai to management mein main represent karunga na ki sir ye aap bataiye kya solution hai to ho sakta hai ki management aapko kuch better solution de refund karna hai kya karna hai usme genuine kuch issue hoga to us par hum baat kar sakte hai. Main ye keh raha hu aapse.
Customer: Theek hai Prabhat ji aapki baat main samajh gaya.
Customer: Aapko main koi main aapko koi ye nahi kar raha hu blame kisi cheez ke liye. Main to bas ye keh raha hu ki jo bhi aapne bola maine sun liya sab kuch. Thank you aapki help ke liye but.
Executive: Abhi main unko escalate bhi karunga is issue ko jo jinhone sale kiya tha ki aapne aisa aisa bola tha customer ye bol rahe hain unko lead genuine nahi aa rahi hai fir par unko turant ka call bhi aaya aapka phone na utha to wo aapke saamne dekhenge turant mein call karna shuru karenge kyunki main usko escalate bhi karunga waha par ki sir kya dikkat hai kyunki dekhiye mujhe koi koi main aisa nahi ki main kisi ki complaint kar raha hu but main ek baar dekhiye sir hamara kaam hota hai main call par na kuch to unko mail ke through puchhta hu to mail par unse baat karta hu ki kya hai nahi hai kyunki hum sir Noida head office mein baithe hain wo kaun se department baithe wo Dehradun baithe hain to escalate kar sakte hain sir kya hai nahi hai unhone kya expectation setting ki but overall sir we all are IndiaMART. To
Customer: Ha main wahi nahi bola wahi maine bhi bola ki mujhe IndiaMART se chahiye na ki kisi personal se. Mujhe to main ye bhi bol sakta tha bhai Piyush aapse chahiye mujhe are Piyush ki kya galti hai wahi wo to apna kaam kar raha hai naukri kar raha hai wo to apni.
Executive: Obvious sir hum log ka pura pura servicing ka hota hai aap mujhe baithkar jitne product dalwaoge hum pura pure saal services karte hain aur customer ka renewal karte hain bas. To sir maine data bhi dekha cow dung cake store manure ki lead bahut achhi hai cow dung powder cake cow dung cake ki kam hai. To manure aur powder ki lead to theek thak hai to I am damn sure ki sir agar lead generate aa rahi hai kya aa rahi hai to wahi hai sir dekho abhi aapne kar diye one month mein sir kuch thoda idea aapko lagega ek site bhi aap trade.indiamart.com kholiye waha se bhi lead dekhiye system par agar aap dekhenge all India bhi aap select karke dekh sakte hain lead ko jab aapko recommended aur recent mein na dikhe to all India bhi lead ko aap uthakar dekhiye ki kya pata waha se aapko kuch kaam ki lead mil jaaye.
Customer: To 70 mein agar sir 50% lead aisi ho rahi hai jaha buyer bilkul mana hi kar raha hai ki nahi ji maine to lead post hi nahi ki galti se post ho gayi ya buyer aisa bol raha hai ki nahi ji maine to mere bachche ne lead post kar di ya to mujhe aisa buyer bol raha hai ki mujhe ji nahi chahiye thi galti se post to obvious si baat hai sir aapke paas aap khud data maintain kar rahe hain aap maintain karte rahiye aap us hisab se mujhe bata to sakte hain na ki ha itni itna ratio hai itna ye raha tabhi to main bhi aage represent karunga na sir.
Customer: Tabhi to maine bataya na ki 60 40 ka ratio hai 60% kar diye par ji 60% ke liye.
Executive: Correct. Yes one week one week baad aap dobara mujhe feedback dijiyega one week ya 10 days aur ruk jaaiye 10 days baad feedback aur dijiye aaj 24 hai aap mujhe 1 tarikh ya 1 ko 2 ko phone kijiye 7 din baad ke Prabhat aapke kehne par 7 din maine aur use kiya kya raha feedback main uske hisab se utni lead ka ek baar data feedback karunga agar nahi banega to obvious si baat hai sir hame bhi management mein rakhne ke liye data chahiye na ki bhai sir ye cheezein hai sir ye customer ko dikkat aa rahi hai customer satisfy hai nahi hai kya pata kuch aapko samajh mein aane laga nahi yaar main isse nikal lunga paisa us hisab se fir aage hum badh sakte hain cheezon ko.
Customer: Chalo theek hai abhi abhi hum aisa kar lete hain ye ye term rahi aapki aur meri theek hai abhi jo aapne mujhe bola wo sab main karne ko taiyar hu ek ek week mein aur check karta hu theek hai aaj monday hai abhi next monday ko baat karenge pehli cheez dusri cheez ye jo abhi isse pehle jo hua wo aap escalate kijiye please hai na.
Executive: Ha abhi main escalate bilkul unko kar raha hu unka call bhi aayega to aap unko yehi bolna sir ki kya hai nahi hai aap us clearly karenge baki main apni taraf se enrichment aur profile pe jo bhi work ho sakta hai wo main kara hi raha hu aap mujhe na 2 tarikh ko phone karna theek hai kyunki hamara sunday working hai to 1 ko hamara off rahega to 2 ko aap phone karna tuesday ko.
Customer: Sure sure bilkul main 2 ko aapko call karunga 2 ko connect karenge hum aur agar kuch rahega lagega mujhe ki ha improvement hai to chalo thank you uske liye baki abhi apan isko aap escalate kar dijiye jo bhi baat hamari isse pehle hui hai theek hai.
Executive: Correct correct ha bilkul main usko escalate kar raha hu ki aise aise cheezein hai kya expectation hai jo bhi hai main usko escalate kar raha hu 24 25 26 27 28 29 30 rahega 1 2 1 aap tab tak 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 din aap use karenge to 8 din mein lagbhag lagbhag mere khayal se aap 16 17 18 20 lead ke aas paas use kijiye dekhiye kya hota hai abhi isse 12 kar dijiye 20 us hisab se thoda sa aapko idea lag jaayega na sir ki kya hai nahi hai saari cheezein samajh mein aa jaayegi aur apni taraf se obvious si baat hai sir aapne work kiya to aapko convince karna hai malum hi hoga achhi tarike se follow up karte hi honge usme I am damn sure aapko pata hi hai excel excel pe data maintain rakhiyega apna lead kharid kharid ke.
Customer: Sab kuch sab kuch maintained hai mera.
Executive: Theek hai main apni taraf se ye kar sakta hu aur bhi product ko enrichment jo maine bola wo main karwa deta hu aaj aur lead ka flow badhane ki koshish karta hu theek hai aur escalate karta hu isko theek hai.
Customer: Ji theek hai thank you Prabhat ji.
Executive: Thank you thank you tab tak ke sir main aapka ye jo hai sir abhi mere liye ek feedback aayega one week baad aap jaisa solution main ye nahi bol raha ki main refund hi kara dunga ya main wo bhi kar dunga but aapke satisfaction result hi aapko milega sir jo bhi hai. To sir aapke paas koi executive se main khud yaha sir 10 saal mujhe yaha par keval job karte ho gaye sir isse pehle bhi tha to main aisa nahi ki aapko galat cheezein dunga but ha jo bhi inhone sale kiya tha us par main escalate bhi kar raha hu theek hai.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Theek hai to sir aapne end se main concern band kar raha hu 2 ko mujhe phone kijiye ga aur fir bhi koi dikkat aati hai main aapko whatsapp bhi kar raha hu is number pe call kar sakte hain whatsapp bhi kar sakte hain kabhi bhi aisa koi dikkat nahi ki maine aapko one week bola to one week baad hi call karna hai 2 3 din mein aapko kuch lage to phone kar lijiyega theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Thank you okay theek hai unka phone aayega to sir apne hisab se baat kar lena jinhone sale kiya tha khud call karenge abhi aapko theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir ek feedback aayega sir mere liye please sir aapko jo theek lage wo satisfy ya not satisfy wo aap kar dena theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai thank you thank you.
Executive: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants refund if leads don't convert.

- Customer says executive offered refund earlier.

- Customer says leads are not genuine.



Resolution:

- Executive will escalate the issue to sales team.

- Executive will enrich product listings to improve leads.

- Executive asked customer to maintain data of leads.

- Executive asked customer to wait one week for feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call executive after one week.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, subscription, escalation
